name: Clarice (Clemediac Games)
description:
you have been kidnapped by Clarice, try and escape her house before she kills you. Also help me put this on the Google PlayStore by donating, the goal is at most $20.

controls

W,A,S,D - move

E - hide under bed

SPACE - throw/drop object

LEFT MOUSE - pickup object

RIGHT MOUSE - fire

ESC - Homescreen
